description: Coby DP240 portable digital photo album with MP3 player along with attractive leather cover, 2.4" TFT LCD color display, integrated 1 GB flash memory stores over 400 pictures, lets you store and display your photos easily, displays JPEG and BMP photo files, photo slideshow mode, SD card slot, USB 2.0 hi-speed for fast file transfers, integrated rechargeable battery, brown
title: Coby DP240 2.4-Inch Portable Digital Photo Album with MP3 Player (Brown)
